thread.title: Chandra Raynier
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Chandra Raynier

author: Chandra Raynier
title: Chandra Raynier
text: The vacation itinerary was excellent, exactly what we wanted. the pace and time was very manageable. I loved the accommodations, they were exceptional, top of the line more than 5 stars. Because these accommodations were based on safari locations, they were quite remote and far away from other attractions.
